title: Dashyard Configuration
description: Configuration file for the Dashyard application (config.yaml).

site_title.description: The title displayed in the header. Defaults to "Dashyard".

header_color.description: CSS color value for the header background (e.g. "#dc2626", "red"). When omitted, the default theme color is used.

session_secret.description: Secret key for session signing. Auto-generated if omitted. Supports ${VAR} and ${VAR:-default} environment variable expansion.

cookie_secure.description: Set the Secure flag on session cookies. Enable when serving over HTTPS (directly or behind a TLS-terminating reverse proxy).

trusted_proxies.description: List of IP addresses or CIDRs trusted to set X-Forwarded-For headers.

datasources.description: Named datasource configurations. Each datasource defines a Prometheus backend that can be referenced by name from dashboard panels and variables. When omitted, a single default datasource pointing to http://localhost:9090 is created.

name.description: Unique name for this datasource, referenced in dashboard panels and variables.

type.description: Datasource type. Currently only 'prometheus' is supported.

url.description: Datasource server URL. Supports ${VAR} and ${VAR:-default} environment variable expansion.

timeout.description: Query timeout as a Go duration string (e.g. "30s", "1m").

default.description: Mark this datasource as the default. Exactly one datasource must be default when multiple are defined. Auto-set when only one datasource exists.

headers.description: Custom HTTP headers to include in every request to this datasource. Values support environment variable expansion using ${VAR} and ${VAR:-default} syntax.

value.description: HTTP header value. Supports ${VAR} and ${VAR:-default} environment variable expansion (e.g. 'Bearer ${MY_TOKEN}').

dir.description: Path to the directory containing dashboard YAML files.

password_hash.description: SHA-512 crypt password hash. Generate with: dashyard mkpasswd <password>. Supports ${VAR} and ${VAR:-default} environment variable expansion.

oauth.description: List of OAuth/OIDC providers. Currently only 'github' is supported.

client_id.description: OAuth client ID. Supports ${VAR} and ${VAR:-default} environment variable expansion.

client_secret.description: OAuth client secret. Supports ${VAR} and ${VAR:-default} environment variable expansion.

redirect_url.description: OAuth callback URL (e.g. 'http://localhost:8080/auth/github/callback'). Supports ${VAR} and ${VAR:-default} environment variable expansion.

base_url.description: Base URL for GitHub Enterprise. When set, uses custom OAuth endpoints derived from this URL. Leave unset for github.com. Supports ${VAR} and ${VAR:-default} environment variable expansion.

allowed_users.description: List of allowed usernames. If empty, all authenticated users are allowed.

allowed_orgs.description: List of allowed GitHub organization names.
